column2: but can’t afford to get there.

column1: 1374123997172957185 2021-03-22 18:21:05 -0400 <FLOTUS> It’s the parent who just lost their job and quietly visits the food bank for groceries to get by. Or the child whose stomach growls until the teacher slips them a granola bar or apple to eat.
1374123852557524994 2021-03-22 18:20:31 -0400 <FLOTUS> It’s possible you may not even realize your friends and family could be suffering — because hunger is a silent agony.
